title: A Scaley situation
creator_credit: Education Department of Victoria for Zoo Education Services, James Mann and Mark Laughlin
brief_description: Linda Roach interviews Chris Banks, Keeper in Charge and Jon Birkett from the Melbourne Zoo who outline the physical characteristics of various reptiles. Illustrates first aid for venomous reptile bites. Warning: Some scenes depict zoo animals feeding. Parents and teachers are advised that some of these scenes may upset young children.
